Name: phantombot-1
Overview: PhantomBot is a Twitch chat bot powered by Java. PhantomBot has many modern features out of the box such as a built-in webpanel, enhanced moderation, games, a point system, raffles, custom commands, a music player, and more. PhantomBot can also be integrated with many services such as Discord, Twitter, TipeeeStream, StreamLabs and StreamElements!
